products.name: Organic Soil Conditioner
products.description: This soil conditioner is made from organic matter and natural minerals, designed to improve soil structure and fertility. It helps retain moisture and provides essential nutrients to plants.

products.name: Worm Composting Bin (Vermicompost Kit)
products.description: A complete vermicomposting kit that includes a bin, red worms, and instructions. Ideal for turning organic waste into nutrient-rich compost using earthworms.

products.name: Organic Plant Food (Liquid Fertilizer)
products.description: A concentrated liquid fertilizer made from organic plant extracts and seaweed. Suitable for all types of plants, including vegetables, fruits, and flowers.

products.name: Organic Seedling Starter Kit
products.Description: A kit containing organic soil mix, biodegradable pots, and a variety of organic seeds. Perfect for starting seedlings indoors or in a greenhouse.

products.name: Drip Irrigation System for Organic Gardens
products.description: A customizable drip irrigation system designed for small to medium-sized organic gardens. It conserves water and delivers it directly to plant roots.

products.name: Organic Fruit & Vegetable Wash
products.description: A natural, non-toxic wash for cleaning fruits and vegetables, removing dirt, wax, and pesticide residues. Safe for all produce.

products.name: Eco Friendly Plant Pots
products.description: Biodegradable plant pots made from recycled materials. These pots decompose naturally and can be planted directly in the ground, reducing transplant shock.

products.name: Organic Mulch(Coconut Coir)
products.description: The Neo 7 (5G) is a gaming-centric 5G smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 750G processor, 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage. It comes with a 48MP rear camera and a 16MP front camera for capturing gaming moments and selfies.

products.name: Insect-Repelling Plant Mix
products.description: A collection of organic seeds for plants known to repel insects, such as marigold, basil, and lavender. Perfect for natural pest control in your garden.

products.name: Bee-Friendly Flower Seeds
products.description: The Neo 6 is a mid-range 4G smartphone equipped with a Snapdragon 778G processor, 8GB RAM, and 256GB storage. It features a 50MP rear camera and a 16MP front camera for capturing memorable moments with clarity.

products.name: Organic Plant Disease Control
products.description: TA natural, organic fungicide and bactericide for controlling plant diseases like blight, mildew, and rust. Safe for edible plants.

products.name: Organic Plant Stakes with Tees
products.description: Bamboo plant stakes paired with natural fiber ties, ideal for supporting growing plants without damaging them. Perfect for tomatoes, cucumbers, and other vine crops.
